Vignette Title

Vignette Author

2017-01-25

Downloading all the parks in a city of your choice

In the next use case, you want to explore all the parks in your local city. We’ll set that as follows:

city <- "Leeds"

Now we can construct a query for osmdata to download all the relevant parks, as follows:

library(osmdata)
library(sp)
bb <- getbb(place_name = city)
q <- opq(bbox = bb)
q <- add_feature(q, "amenity", "park")
res <- osmdata_sp(q = q, quiet = FALSE)
names(res)
plot(res$osm_polygons)
# plot with tmap
library(tmap)
tmap_mode("view")
qtm(res$osm_polygons)
